Others: Joel Embiid made his season debut against the New York Knicks on Tuesday in the 2024 Emirates NBA Cup opener.
Embiid was out managing his left knee, which kept him out for six games.
The NBA suspended him for the last three games after engaging in a physical altercation with a reporter.
Embiid didn't have the return he would have hoped for, as the 76ers lost 111-99.
Embiid struggled in his first game, failing to catch a rhythm.
The game was close until the third quarter, but New York created a significant separation in the final quarter.
Here are Joel Embiid's stats vs. Knicks: PTS - 13, REB - 3, AST - 5, STL - 0, BLK - 0, TO - 1, FG - 2-11, 3-PT FG - 1-5, FTM - 8-8, +/- -7, MIN - 26:25
